projects.title: Neon City VFX
projects.description: 3D VFX integration shot blending live-action footage with rendered futuristic cityscapes. The challenge was to match lighting and reflections for a seamless composite.

projects.title: Dimension Drift
projects.description: A series of digital illustrations exploring themes of alternate realities and ethereal beings. Each piece is crafted with a unique color palette and intricate line work.

projects.title: Echoes in Stillness
projects.description: An experimental motion piece exploring the visualization of sound in a minimalist environment. Abstract shapes react and morph to an ambient soundtrack.

projects.title: Cyberscape
projects.description: A high-energy title sequence for a fictional sci-fi series. It combines glitch aesthetics with fluid simulations and holographic UI elements.

projects.title: Solaris
projects.description: A cinematic journey through a stylized solar system, focusing on dramatic lighting and planetary textures. Rendered with Redshift for photorealistic results.
